articles.title: Decision Inc. Australia Helps Accelerate GenAI MVP Delivery For OFS, Enabling Real-Time Manufacturing Intelligence
articles.author: Dellamore Bridal
articles.summary: OFS launched Mayvn AI in February 2025, a GenAI-powered operational intelligence tool embedded within the OFS platform. This new feature functions as an intelligent co-pilot for manufacturing leadership, surfacing real-time insights and enabling faster, data-backed decisions. Over 200 manufacturers worldwide are already using Mayvn AI.

articles.title: Nex Media, which has been converging digital marketing and sales solutions, has taken the first step..
articles.author: The God
articles.summary: NexMedia has introduced a ChatGPT-based AI function for the first time on the official website of "Jeonju Raon Private Personal", which is set to be supplied in Jeonju. This AI platform allows visitors to check information, subscription conditions, schedules, and contract-related matters in real time. The AI functions as a 'smart counselor' available 24/7, handling inquiries even during off-peak hours.

articles.title: Google launches Android 16 with major software upgrades
articles.author: China.dot.org
articles.summary: Google launched Android 16, a major software update, on Tuesday. The update is initially available for Pixel smartphones and introduces new features related to messaging and photos. Android 16 also lays the foundation for the Material 3 Expressive design to improve accessibility and ease of use.

articles.title: Qualcomm's vision for smart glasses ditches the need for phone and internet connectivity
articles.author: Justin Diaz
articles.summary: Qualcomm demonstrated its new Snapdragon AR1+ platform, designed for smart glasses, at AWE USA using RayNeo X3 Pro Smart Glasses. The platform enables on-device AI processing, eliminating the need for internet or smartphone connectivity. Qualcomm highlights that the Snapdragon AR1+ platform is 26% smaller and opens the door for smaller, more stylish smart glasses like the RayNeo X3 Pro.

articles.title: The Last Word: Dallas AI Experts Author New Executive Prompting Guide
articles.author: Dallas Innovates
articles.summary: Babar Bhatti and Masood Khan have launched their new book, 'Beginner to Executive Prompting Guide,' during the Dallas AI Summer Program at Southern Methodist University. This book aims to help people effectively use AI tools by teaching them prompt engineering, and it is now available on Amazon.

articles.title: Walmart uses artificial intelligence in ‘Sparky' shopping app
articles.author: Kim Souza
articles.summary: Walmart launched 'Ask Sparky,' an AI-driven shopping assistant integrated into its mobile app. Currently, Sparky assists with shopping needs like Father's Day gift ideas and weather forecasts, using natural language searches. Walmart intends to enhance Sparky with features like meal planning and agentic AI for a more intuitive and comprehensive customer experience.

articles.title: Starbucks AI assistant, powered by Microsoft, helps baristas focus more on coffee and customers
articles.author: Kurt Schlosser
articles.summary: Starbucks is launching 'Green Dot Assist,' an AI-powered assistant to help baristas with tasks and improve customer service. Additionally, Starbucks announced a next-generation point-of-sale system designed to reduce training time, minimize drink remakes, enhance workflow, improve accessibility, and offer customer personalization.

articles.title: Apple introduces Liquid Glass to make iOS and iPadOS more expressive
articles.author: Joe Hindy
articles.summary: Apple announced Liquid Glass, a new design language, at WWDC. Liquid Glass is a material that sits above the user interface, moves based on user interaction, and refracts light.

articles.title: 5 new TDTNews.com features you're going to love
articles.author: STAFF REPORT
articles.summary: TDTNews launched a new website featuring new features. This launch signifies the introduction of a new service or significant update to an existing one.

articles.title: Aiper Day Is Here: Save Big, Clean Easy, and Dive Into Summer Fun  Jun. 10, 2025 21:00
articles.summary: Aiper has launched 'Aiper Day', an annual event offering savings on its cordless robotic pool cleaning solutions. Customers can save over $1,000 on select Aiper products such as Scuba X1 Pro Max and HydroComm Pro Bundle , Scuba X1 & Surfer S2 Bundle . Aiper is also collaborating with United Parks & Resorts for pop-up events promoting family fun and sustainability.

articles.title: YouTube Adds Integrated Promote Option, Alternate Thumbnails for Different Regions
articles.author: Andrew Hutchinson
articles.summary: YouTube is integrating its 'Promote' option into the main app, allowing creators to promote videos and check campaign status directly from YouTube. YouTube is also testing a feature to allow creators to upload alternate thumbnail images for videos dubbed into other languages. Finally, YouTube is testing alerts for new creator posts within the Shorts feed, aiming to increase engagement.

articles.title: Upgrade To Interface Magazine For Even More Cyberpunk RED DLC
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Cyberpunk RED introduces a downloadable content (DLC) program offering new guns, gear, rules, and adventure ideas. This DLC is available in both free and paid versions.

articles.title: Microsoft is stepping up to fix USB-C
articles.author: Craig Donaldson
articles.summary: Microsoft is updating its Windows Hardware Compatibility Program (WHCP) requirements for USB-C ports on Windows 11 laptops, mandating support for USB data, charging, and display capabilities. All USB-C ports on Windows 11 laptops are now required to support DisplayPort Alt Mode, ensuring compatibility with external displays. These changes aim to standardize USB-C port functionality and reduce user confusion across a wide range of Windows 11 laptops.

articles.title: Chick-fil-A testing 2 new chicken sandwiches: See where
articles.author: Jonathan Limehouse
articles.summary: Chick-fil-A is testing two new chicken sandwiches: the Jalapeño Ranch Club in Salt Lake City and the Creamy BBQ in Jacksonville, from June 9 through July 19. The Jalapeño Ranch Club features a chicken filet, pepper jack cheese, candied bacon, lettuce, tomato, pickled jalapeños, and jalapeño ranch sauce, while the Creamy BBQ includes a chicken filet, creamy BBQ slaw, and sweet heat pickle chips with creamy BBQ sauce.

articles.title: Android 16: New Features & Updates – What's Next?
articles.author: James Carter
articles.summary: Google's Android 16 introduces a new release cadence with major releases in late spring and smaller updates later in the year. The release includes Pixel VIPs, an evolution of the favorite contacts feature that prioritizes communication from key individuals on Pixel devices. Android 16 also expands availability of Expressive Captions to the UK, Australia, and Canada, and improved accessibility features like better hearing aid support and live search in the magnifier app.

articles.title: Why brand-led innovation is the key to defeating the 90% failure rate
articles.author: Fast Company Executive Board
articles.summary: Saudia Airlines, in collaboration with Landor and BRRR Technology, launched 'The Coolest Ihram,' a high-tech cooling garment designed for pilgrims. This product aims to address the issue of heatstroke during Hajj by creating a personal cooling microclimate. 'The Coolest Ihram' embodies Saudia's brand promise of 'Welcome to Our Future' by blending tradition and modernity while caring for passengers beyond the flight.

articles.title: Cvent Announces General Availability of Cvent Essentials
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Cvent launched Cvent Essentials, a new product for managing high-volume, simple in-person events. This solution simplifies planning and execution of smaller gatherings, enabling teams to scale event programs with speed and consistency. It includes features like simplified event creation, streamlined registration, engagement tools, and real-time data integration with platforms like Salesforce and HubSpot.

articles.title: Thin, light, and durable: the new era of the Galaxy Z series
articles.author: Criticologos
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics is refining its Galaxy Z series to be thinner, lighter, and more durable. The company aims to improve the portability and usability of its foldable phones, building upon the initial Galaxy Fold introduced in 2019. These ongoing refinements focus on meeting the evolving needs of users by enhancing the design and functionality of the Galaxy Z series.

articles.title: MONAT Celebrates Record-Breaking Launch in Germany
articles.author: Monat Global
articles.summary: MONAT Global Corp launched its products in Germany. The launch was the company's most successful international debut. Thousands of Market Partners and customers across Germany embraced the brand's products.

articles.title: In 2025 we fell in love with this "Beach Vibes" perfume
articles.author: Marina Collins
articles.summary: Jil Sander introduces Sunrise, a new perfume designed to capture the essence of summer. The fragrance features refreshing bergamot as a top note, elegant orange blossom as a heart note, and warm amber as a base note.

articles.title: MONAT Celebrates Record-Breaking Launch in Germany
articles.author: Monat Global
articles.summary: MONAT Global Corp has launched its haircare, skincare, wellness, and beauty products in Germany. The launch marks the company's most successful international debut, with thousands of Market Partners and customers joining the MONAT community.

articles.title: Scouted: Finally, a Clear SPF That Doesn't Leave Behind a Glaring White Cast
articles.summary: Shiseido's Clear Sunscreen Stick SPF 50+ is a broad-spectrum sunscreen designed for face and body, suitable for all skin types and can be used over or under makeup. The sunscreen applies clear without leaving a white cast or oily residue and features Shiseido's WetForce and HeatForce technology which makes it more effective when wet or under intense heat.

articles.title: Android Is Copying Samsung's DeX Desktop Mode
articles.author: Arol Wright
articles.summary: Google is introducing a full-fledged desktop mode to Android 16, developed in collaboration with Samsung. This feature will include desktop windowing and connected displays, allowing Android to display apps within windows, and will be available on tablets and phones connected to external displays. Beta testers can currently check it out through the Android 16 QPR1 Beta 2 build.

articles.title: AG Lubricants partners with leading steel manufacturer to enhance productivity and operational efficiency
articles.author: SAT Articles
articles.summary: AG Lubricants has partnered with a South African steel company to supply Mobil lubricants and Quaker Houghton industrial fluids. AG Lubricants installed a lubrication system utilizing Mobil Grease, providing proactive maintenance alerts. Quakerol HB Series hot mill rolling oil reduces roll force and extends roll life, while Quintolubric 888 Series is a fire-resistant hydraulic fluid.

articles.title: Pattern Integrates AWS-Powered Generative AI Solution with Amazon Nova to Enhance Its Ecommerce Acceleration Platform
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Pattern has launched Content Brief, a content optimization technology solution powered by Amazon Bedrock and Amazon Nova. Content Brief analyzes text, imagery, and video data, and provides actionable recommendations to modify product titles, descriptions, and visual assets to improve traffic and conversion rates. This solution aims to drive marketplace performance for consumer brands.

articles.title: Android 16: New Camera, Live Updates & Features!
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Android 16 introduces proactive AI-driven intelligence, featuring a revamped notification system with contextual awareness powered by on-device AI processing. It enhances the camera with computational photography for improved image quality and new creative possibilities.  The new operating system prioritizes privacy through on-device processing.

articles.title: The anti-ageing secrets that'll stop your hands from looking old before their time
articles.author: Laura Sutcliffe
articles.summary: Margaret Dabbs London introduced LED Hand Mitts which helps stimulate collagen and reduce inflammation, while Near-Infrared Light works deeper into the dermis to improve elasticity and firm the skin. HELLO Sunday launched 'The One For Your Hands', a lightweight cream offering sun protection with aloe vera and jojoba oil. Grown Alchemist offers Invigorate Hand Wash which has luxury, plant-based ingredients.

articles.title: G2 Introduces AI-Led Conversational Reviews and Research with Acquisition of unSurvey
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: G2 acquired AI capabilities from unSurvey to launch a new AI-first review experience. This includes voice-based feedback and AI-moderated interviews that transform review collection and custom research. The new AI-led custom research allows organizations to gather rich, structured feedback faster compared to traditional methods.

articles.title: AdGPT.com Democratizes AI-Powered Advertising: Helping Businesses Get Ahead of the Curve
articles.author: Rhiannon Frater
articles.summary: AdGPT.com has launched an AI-powered advertising platform designed to democratize advertising for businesses of all sizes. The platform creates ads across multiple formats and platforms with a single click, automatically adjusts to platform requirements, and optimizes ads using AI-driven insights. AdGPT also plans to launch an API in Q4 2025 and is expanding its presence across major CMS platforms.

articles.title: Samsung teases its next Galaxy Z foldable phone that reached 'a new milestone'
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Samsung is teasing its upcoming Galaxy Z Series, including the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7, with a focus on a thinner, lighter, and more durable design. The company highlights advancements in foldable technology, including a redesigned hinge, and anticipates a July 2025 launch.

articles.title: AliExpress Business Introduces Enhanced Supply Chain Suite to Support Creator Commerce  Jun. 10, 2025 16:30
articles.summary: AliExpress Business has launched its upgraded Supply Chain Suite, an integrated toolkit designed for SMEs, dropshippers, content creators, and group buying organizers. The Suite offers end-to-end support for sourcing, content creation, and distribution, featuring AI Trend Analyst, AI-Powered Visual Studio, Creator & Buyer Network Integration, and a "One-Shop" Web Interface.

articles.title: 全球特色的米饭吃法
articles.author: 8哥去穷游
articles.summary: Volkswagen is set to launch the ID.Every1 concept car in 2027, with an estimated price of 20,000 euros. The new vehicle, built on the MEB platform, features a unique design, including a striking C-pillar reminiscent of the first-generation Golf, and is equipped with a 94-horsepower front motor targeting a 250km range.

articles.title: Digital Silk Introduces AI-Generated Ad Concept Testing to Help U.S. Marketing Teams Refine Creative Strategies
articles.author: Newsfile Corp.
articles.summary: Digital Silk introduced an AI-powered ad concept testing solution for U.S. marketing teams, which utilizes generative AI to simulate ad variations and identify top-performing concepts before campaign launches. This service streamlines creative decision-making by reducing the need for manual concept development and allowing internal stakeholders to test multiple directions across various channels.

articles.title: New N.J. bagel shop is changing the breakfast sandwich game. Here's how.
articles.author: Jeremy Schneider
articles.summary: Cheech's Bagels, a new bagel shop in Jersey City, opened in early May. The shop offers uniquely designed bagels intended for sandwiches, with chewier textures and non-typical toppings. The interior design draws inspiration from Jersey diners, New York delis, and European influences.

articles.title: Find Your Brand's Retail Media Niche Beyond the Big Five
articles.author: Elizabeth Marsten
articles.summary: Chewy launched its own ad platform featuring proprietary tech, enabling tracking of ROAS and autoship conversions. Best Buy is launching a U.S. third-party marketplace and has expanded into self-service PMax campaigns. Uber has partnered with Instacart and Criteo to bring sponsored product tech into its Uber Eats ecosystem, focusing on event-driven campaigns.

articles.title: Dyson's new supersonic hair dryer is really smart
articles.author: Talia Ergas
articles.summary: Dyson has launched the Supersonic Nural hair dryer, an upgrade to the original Supersonic. The new model memorizes heat and speed preferences, automatically adjusts airflow, and pauses when set down, offering a smart and convenient hair drying experience. Also, Dyson Airstrait and Dyson Airwrap i.d. are introduced as hair tools.

articles.title: Papa Johns Launches Its First-Ever Croissant Pizza, Giving Pizza Lovers Their Flakiest Bite Ever
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Papa Johns has launched the Croissant Pizza, a new product that combines croissant texture with pizza flavors. The pizza features a buttery, flaky crust and is customizable with various toppings. Papa Johns collaborated with KidSuper to design a limited-edition hot bag for the Croissant Pizza, which will debut at Paris Fashion Week.

articles.title: Papa Johns Launches Its First-Ever Croissant Pizza, Giving Pizza Lovers Their Flakiest Bite Ever
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Papa Johns is launching a new product, the Croissant Pizza, which combines the texture of a croissant with pizza flavors. Select fans will receive their pizzas in custom-made hot bags designed in collaboration with KidSuper.

articles.title: New Ice Cream Store Opens Inside New Hope's Ferry Market
articles.author: Jeff Werner
articles.summary: Booza Plus has launched at the Ferry Market in New Hope, introducing Middle Eastern-inspired ice cream flavors blended with classic American treats. Their menu includes items like Baklava Sundae and Dubai Brownie.

articles.title: Papa Johns Launches Its First-Ever Croissant Pizza, Giving Pizza Lovers Their Flakiest Bite Ever
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Papa Johns is launching the Croissant Pizza, featuring a buttery croissant crust and customizable toppings. They have collaborated with KidSuper to design a limited-edition hot bag for delivery of the pizza. The Croissant Pizza is being launched globally, starting in the UAE.

articles.title: Papa Johns Launches Its First-Ever Croissant Pizza, Giving Pizza Lovers Their Flakiest Bite Ever
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Papa Johns is globally launching the Croissant Pizza. This new product combines the flaky texture of a croissant with Papa Johns pizza flavors, fulfilling the company's promise of "Better Ingredients. Better Pizza." through craft, quality, and innovation.

articles.title: Bluewater Celebrates 25 Years of Disruption, Growth, and Impact
articles.summary: Bluewater is expanding its brand strategy division and scaling its entertainment and branded content division. The company is also investing in and rebuilding an AI-enabled tech stack for instant results, performance analytics, and predictive marketing strategies. The company plans on rebranding its in-house podcast.

articles.title: I Tried To Make Something In America (The Smarter Scrubber Experiment) - Smarter Every Day 308
articles.author: Donna Hancock
articles.summary: Smarter Every Day has announced the availability of their new product, a scrubber, on their website, smarterscrubber.com. They are concerned about scaling production to meet potential demand and are considering future wholesale partnerships. Interested wholesalers and storytellers are encouraged to contact them.

articles.title: Instantly turn your text into art with this $40 design tool
articles.author: Stack Commerce
articles.summary: Imagiyo AI is launching its AI Image Generator which transforms text prompts into commercial-ready artwork. The generator is built on advanced models like Stable Diffusion and integrated with FLUX AI. A lifetime subscription is available for $39.97.

articles.title: Crayon expands Google Cloud partnership to include mid-market distribution, focused on AI innovation  Jun. 10, 2025 15:06
articles.summary: Crayon and Google Cloud have expanded their partnership to enhance the delivery of Google Cloud's AI technologies and cloud solutions. Crayon, as a Google Cloud Distributor, will enable its channel network to provide streamlined access to Google Cloud's portfolio, support, and simplified billing and management, focusing on AI adoption acceleration.

articles.title: Walmart quietly launches new same-day delivery option in 5 more US cities
articles.author: Dana Sullivan Kilroy
articles.summary: Walmart is expanding its drone delivery service in partnership with Wing, covering areas in Dallas and Frisco, Texas, and turning 100 stores into launch pads in Atlanta, Charlotte, Houston, Orlando, and Tampa. Wing's drones are fast, light, and autonomous, carrying packages up to three pounds, aiming to provide quick contactless delivery of everyday essentials and solve the 'last mile problem'.

articles.title: LambdaTest Unveils AI-Native Test Case Generator to Revolutionize Software Quality Assurance
articles.author: Lambda Test
articles.summary: LambdaTest has launched its AI Test Case Generator, which transforms various input formats into structured test cases, streamlining the test case creation process for QA teams. This new feature integrates with LambdaTest's AI-Native Test Manager platform, allowing for faster test planning, execution, and collaboration.

articles.title: Xbox's new handheld is a surprisingly comfortable way to play Gears
articles.author: Ash Parrish
articles.summary: Xbox, in partnership with Asus, has launched a new handheld line, the ROG Xbox Ally and the Ally X. The Ally X offers improved comfort and performance, resembling an Xbox controller form factor. Initial hands-on experience showed seamless gameplay with titles like Gears of War: Reloaded, suggesting a positive impact on accuracy and control.

articles.title: Get your best look yet at Samsung's thinnest foldable
articles.author: Craig Donaldson
articles.summary: Samsung is teasing the upcoming Galaxy Z Fold 7, emphasizing its "thinnest, lightest, and most advanced" design. The phone is expected to launch in July alongside the Galaxy Z Flip 7 and will introduce One UI 8. Samsung aims to compete in the foldable market with a focus on slimness and portability.

articles.title: Is Claude AI the Next Big Thing After ChatGPT?
articles.author: Odunmorayo Ayobami
articles.summary: Anthropic launched Claude Opus 4 and Claude Sonnet 4 in May 2025. Opus 4 is presented as a top coding model. Sonnet 4 has improved coding, reasoning, and instruction-following and is accessible to free users, and new features like Tool Use (Beta) and Claude Code are available for developers.

articles.title: Windows 11 is getting a nifty trick for quickly mirroring your Android phone right from the Start menu
articles.author: Darren Allan
articles.summary: Microsoft is rolling out a new feature to Windows 11 that allows users to quickly mirror their Android smartphone screen on their desktop via the Phone Link app. The feature is currently in testing and is expected to be available in the release version of Windows 11 in June, with compatibility for devices from Samsung, Asus, Honor, and other manufacturers.

articles.title: Paris Baguette Myum Verone Custom Sculpture
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Paris Baguette has launched 'My Numun', a fully customizable cake experience, offering 462 different flavor combinations with options like Sweet Potato, Chocolate Cream, and Strawberry Cream. The launch includes a Tottenham Myum Verone Campaign in partnership with Tottenham Hotspur, creatively linking the cake to soccer by referring to the whole cake as 'Timple' and individual slices as 'Ganples'.

articles.title: Robots attend virtual school in E China's Zhejiang
articles.summary: Manycore Tech Inc. has developed SpatialVerse, a virtual training platform, that allows robots to master real-world interactions through synthetic data and diverse spatial environments. This platform has enabled robots like Xiaotao to perform complex tasks, drastically boosting learning speed and efficiency for applications in airports, pharmacies, and warehouses. New courses in spatial reasoning will be introduced to further enhance robot autonomy.

articles.title: Go Ahead and Shower With the New Waterproof Magic Wand
articles.summary: Vibratex has launched the Magic Wand Waterproof, a new version of their iconic vibrator. This model addresses previous limitations by being fully waterproof and submersible for up to 30 minutes, facilitating easier cleaning and shower/bath use. The Waterproof version features a more powerful high setting, though it comes with a higher price, longer charging time, and non-operational charging mode.

articles.title: Ink legacy: Hero unveils new chapter in tech
articles.author: China Daily
articles.summary: Shanghai Hero (Group) Co Ltd held a new product launch in Shanghai, unveiling co-branded products with a local cultural creative brand. The launch also previewed a collaboration with Shanghai Film Infinity, demonstrating technological breakthroughs and a commitment to social responsibility.

articles.title: Awin Brings Its Affiliate Platform to Mexico, Connecting Brands With New Audiences
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Awin is expanding into Mexico to meet the demand for affiliate and partner marketing. This expansion will help Awin's partners scale their businesses and capitalize on the growing e-commerce in the region.  The company is also upgrading ShareASale advertisers and has introduced Ava, an AI-powered assistant, to enhance their service offerings.

articles.title: Taj Indian Group ranks among top 4 Indian juice exporter within first year, disrupting F&B export landscape
articles.author: TNN
articles.summary: Taj Indian Group, a newly launched brand, has become the fourth-largest exporter of juices from India within one year. The company is expanding its portfolio to include snacks, bakery products, Indian spices, and ready-to-eat meals, aiming for long-term global market disruption. They are also planning to establish state-of-the-art manufacturing facilities.

articles.title: GOG's One-Click Mods: Instantly Install Popular Add-ons
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: GOG has launched its 'One-Click Mods' feature, simplifying the mod installation process for classic PC games. This feature provides an easy way to install curated, community-favorite add-ons for games like Vampire: The Masquerade – Bloodlines, Doom 3, and Fallout 4, with plans to add Skyblivion in 2025. The One-Click Mods service lowers the barrier to entry for players wanting to explore modding possibilities, enhancing the user experience.

articles.title: Apple's Liquid Glass is exactly as ambitious as Apple
articles.author: Mark Wilson
articles.summary: Apple introduced Liquid Glass, a new design paradigm unifying iOS, MacOS, iPadOS, and WatchOS. This interface features an amorphous glass-like design across various elements like app docks, media controls, and widgets, aiming for a cohesive user experience. Key updates include a magnifier and slider that create a water droplet effect, along with glass app icons that dynamically catch light.

articles.title: 10 last-minute Father's Day gifts from Amazon that ship FAST - with prices from under $20
articles.author: TANYA SHARMA
articles.summary: The article highlights several gift ideas for Father's Day, including the Beats Pill Portable Bluetooth Speaker with 24-hour battery life, Bagsmart 3-in-1 Laptop Bag which converts from a shoulder bag to a messenger bag to a backpack, and the Maestri House LunaFro Max Milk Frother for creating foam for coffee, and the Wacom Intuos Drawing Tablet which is for digital drawing . It also features the Stanley Stay-Chill Beer Stein that keeps drinks cold for up to 5 hours.

articles.title: When is Prime Day 2025? How to sign up for an Amazon Prime membership before summer event
articles.author: Alexis Simmerman
articles.summary: Amazon is launching its global Prime Day event next month, offering discounts on Amazon-exclusive products, trending items, and various brands. Prime members can access deals across more than 35 categories, including electronics, kitchen, beauty, and apparel.

articles.title: Xbox Announces ROG Xbox Ally Handhelds, Its Answer to Steam Deck and Switch
articles.author: Michael Walsh
articles.summary: Microsoft, in partnership with ASUS, is launching two new handheld gaming devices, the ROG Xbox Ally and ROG Xbox Ally X. These devices are designed to compete with Steam Deck and Nintendo Switch, utilizing AMD processors and offering access to Xbox games via cloud or local console, along with PC-only titles. The ROG Xbox Ally targets casual to avid gamers, while the ROG Xbox Ally X is aimed at high-performance enthusiasts. They are expected to arrive in select markets by the holiday season.

articles.title: 33 TikTok-Famous Products That Are Actually Worth It
articles.author: Rebecca O'Connell
articles.summary: Catrice launched "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener, which is a lightweight, color-adapting formula to conceal and brighten dark circles. Olay introduced Super Serum Body Wash, which is the body wash version of their viral, super effective facial Super Serum and is packed with niacinamide, shea butter, and collagen peptides to make skin feel next-level nourished. Balmuda introduced a toaster that uses steam to crisp the outside while keeping moisture locked inside.

articles.title: New Aldi and Starbucks to be built on empty land in Welsh town
articles.author: Robert Dalling
articles.summary: Aldi will construct a new food store and Starbucks will construct a new coffee shop with a drive-thru on vacant land in Aberavon.  Neath Port Talbot Council's planning committee approved the development, which will include 141 parking spaces, bicycle parking, and 18 EV charging points. The development also includes landscaping, drainage works, and improved pedestrian and cycle routes.

articles.title: Walmart Is Selling a $499 4K Digital Camera for Just $126 Right Now, and It's an 'Excellent' Choice for Beginners
articles.author: John Alexander
articles.summary: Walmart is offering the NBD 4K Digital Camera at a discounted price of $126 as part of a flash sale. The camera features 4K resolution, a 48MP lens, 16x digital zoom, and comes with accessories, making it suitable for beginner photographers and vloggers.

articles.title: Limited time deal! Score $150 off the Dyson vacuum that shoppers say 'makes other vacuums seem antiquated'
articles.author: NISHKA DHAWAN
articles.summary: Dyson's V12 Detect Slim Cordless Vacuum is currently on sale for $499.98, offering a $150 discount. The vacuum features strong suction, multiple attachments, a one-hour battery life, and an LCD screen to display battery life and debris collection.  It also can trap 99.97 percent of microscopic dust particles as small as 0.3 microns.

articles.title: I swapped my iron for this two-in-one steamer - under £40
articles.author: Rachael Penn
articles.summary: Morphy Richards launched the Turbosteam two-in-one Garment Steamer and Iron. It heats up in under 60 seconds and can be used horizontally for steaming or vertically for ironing. The steamer works well on various fabrics, especially cotton, effectively removing creases.

articles.title: OnePlus Nord 5 Price, Release Date, Design, Colors, Camera, Specifications And More, All We Know So Far
articles.author: Sparsh Sharma
articles.summary: OnePlus is preparing to launch the OnePlus Nord 5 and Nord CE 5 in India on July 8, 2025. The OnePlus Nord 5 is expected to feature a 6.83-inch OLED display, MediaTek Dimensity 9400+ processor, up to 16GB RAM, 1TB storage, a 50-megapixel main camera, and a 6700 mAh battery with 100W fast charging, and will be available in Titanium, Phantom Black and Breeze Blue.

articles.title: Ink legacy: Hero unveils new chapter in tech
articles.author: He Qi
org: Shanghai Promotion Center for City of Design
articles.summary: Shanghai Hero (Group) Co Ltd held a new product launch, unveiling 12 new products across three major series: Creative Products of Red Culture, IP Collaboration, and Category Expansion. The company is implementing the "Hero+" strategy focusing on product diversification, design innovation, cultural integration, and technological advancements to revitalize the brand and transition into a cultural lifestyle brand.

articles.title: Finding the Proper Software for an Efficient Digital Solution
articles.summary: SoftwareFloor is introduced as a centralized platform to discover and compare business software solutions, including accounting, CRM, and ERP systems. It enables users to evaluate features, read user reviews, and connect with software providers. SoftwareFloor also allows vendors to list products, showcase unique selling points, and engage with a ready audience.

articles.title: Nokia 1100 to come with massive battery and amazing camera?
articles.author: Asianet Newsable English
articles.summary: Nokia is rumored to relaunch the classic Nokia 1100 in 2025, equipped with 4G and a DSLR-level camera. The phone features premium materials like aerospace-grade aluminum and ceramic keys, a 6000mAh battery providing weeks of use, and a 2.8-inch screen.

articles.title: Divi's scalp serum is back on sale at Amazon, and it's a miracle for thinning hair
articles.author: Lehigh Valley
articles.summary: Divi offers a bestselling scalp serum designed to revitalize hair for the summer season.

articles.title: CSC ServiceWorks Taps PayRange to Unlock Instant Pricing Power and New Profits
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: CSC ServiceWorks partnered with PayRange to retrofit its commercial washers and dryers with PayRange technology. This upgrade introduces real-time revenue management, dynamic pricing, and enhanced consumer engagement through CSC's One Tap Away app. The technology launch will improve convenience for 40 million users across the U.S.

articles.title: Godrej Advantis smart lock for main door review: Keyless entry, nine ways, all from your phone
articles.author: Bharat Sharma
articles.summary: Godrej has launched the Smart Lock Advantis IoT9, a main-door digital lock with nine unlocking methods including fingerprint, PIN, and NFC. The lock is managed via the Advantis app, which allows users to grant access to guests and manage settings. The Smart Lock Advantis IoT9 aims to provide keyless entry and remote access features, offering a more convenient and secure home entry solution.

articles.title: Amaze Launches Beta Testing Program for Latest Innovation: Amaze Digital Fits
articles.author: ACCESS Newswire
articles.summary: Amaze Software, a subsidiary of Amaze Holdings, Inc., has launched a beta testing program for Amaze Digital Fits. This web-based tool allows Roblox creators to design avatar fashion without needing 3D experience.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 60 with 50MP dual camera, Moto AI launched in India at ₹25999
articles.author: MD Ijaj Khan
articles.summary: Motorola launched the Motorola Edge 60 smartphone in India, featuring upgrades like a larger battery and a 50MP front camera. The phone is powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 7400 chipset, paired with 12GB of RAM and 256GB of storage and runs on Android 15 with Motorola's Hello UI. Priced at Rs. 25,999, the Motorola Edge 60 will be available from June 17 via Flipkart, Motorola's website, and offline stores.

articles.title: Nockta Transforms Digital Glitch into Art for GLIX's New Website
articles.author: Newsfile
articles.summary: Dynamic digital marketing task force Nockta has unveiled the new website for glix.shop. The website features glix.shop's glitchy, experimental spirit and disrupted conventional digital interfaces.

articles.title: Hollow Knight Silksong could launch even sooner than expected
articles.author: Liam Martin
articles.summary: Microsoft announced that Hollow Knight: Silksong will be available for Xbox Ally and Game Pass at launch. Team Cherry clarified that the game's release is before the holiday season and not tied to the ROG Xbox Ally launch. The ROG Xbox Ally combines the power of Xbox with the freedom of Windows, allowing users to play Xbox games and download other storefronts.

articles.title: The best hair dryers for 2025, tried and tested with expert advice from an A-list stylist
articles.author: Emily Peck
articles.summary: The article highlights the launch and features of several new hair dryers from brands like Dyson (Supersonic Nural), Remington (One Dry & Style), Parlux (Digitalyon Light Air Ionizer), Cloud Nine (The Airshot Pro), GHD (Helios), and others. These new hair dryers incorporate advanced technologies and designs, such as infrared heat adjustment (Dyson), ionic systems (Remington), and lightweight digital motors (Parlux), to improve hair health and styling efficiency.

articles.title: Butter 'doesn't get better than this' — only 1 item needed
articles.author: Ellen Jenne
articles.summary: Cooking experts at Delish have introduced a simple method to create homemade butter in just ten minutes using only double cream. This cost-effective alternative to store-bought butter involves shaking double cream in a jar until it separates into buttermilk and butter.

articles.title: BING Archives
articles.author: Priya Deshmukh
articles.summary: OpenAI launched 'ChatGPT Search' on Thursday. The 'ChatGPT Search' search engine challenges Google's dominance in online search.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 60 Smartphone With 50-Megapixel Selfie Camera Launched in India, Will Go On Sale On June 17
articles.author: Tasneem Kanchwala
articles.summary: Motorola has launched its new Motorola Edge 60 smartphone in India, priced at Rs. 25,999. The device features a 6.67-inch OLED display, a quad-camera setup including a 50MP primary sensor, and a 5,500mAh battery with 68W fast charging. It will be available on Flipkart, the company website, and offline stores starting June 17.

articles.title: Strategy Will Help Keep Your Brand's Voice Alive in the Age of AI Advertising
articles.author: Pablo Urdiales Antelo
articles.summary: Netflix plans to integrate generative AI into its in-app midroll and pause ads by 2026 while simultaneously developing an in-house advertising team. Meta will offer AI-powered advertising tools to users for creating and enhancing their digital presence within Instagram and Facebook, enabling features like text prompts and image expansion.

articles.title: The most recent YouTube downgrade is just history repeating itself
articles.author: Eli Becht
articles.summary: Google's YouTube Premium Lite, priced at $8/month, is experiencing a change in service with the introduction of more ads. This change could potentially drive users toward the full YouTube Premium subscription. The increasing number of ads may cause the value proposition of YouTube Premium Lite to decrease.

articles.title: 6 Vacuums Under $200 That Reviewers Say Perform Just Like A Dyson
articles.author: Erica Kam
articles.summary: Trucozie introduces an 8-in-1 cordless stick vacuum with multiple suction modes and attachments. Shark's Pet cordless stick vacuum is praised for its anti-allergen features and performance. Levoit's LVAC-200 cordless stick vacuum is highlighted for its anti-hair wrap design and ease of use, while Tineco's Go Pet cordless vacuum features an anti-tangle brush and long runtime.

articles.title: Mazzio's experiments with three new ranch dressing flavors
articles.author: James D. Watts Jr. Tulsa World
articles.summary: Mazzio's, a Tulsa-based pizza chain, is introducing three new flavors to its signature ranch dressing: Avocado Ranch, Jalapeño Ranch, and Smoky Ranch. These flavors, along with the Classic Ranch, will be available as part of the 'Ranch Bar' at dine-in locations and for takeaway/delivery until August 11.

articles.title: Auntie Anne's unveils new store design targeting Gen Z and millennials
articles.author: Global Data
articles.summary: Auntie Anne's is launching a new store design targeting Gen Z and millennial consumers. The design includes changed signage, modular layout, color palette, and materials aligned with the latest logo and brand voice, aiming to streamline operations and support long-term growth.

articles.title: Hours after iOS 26 launch, Google is preparing to officially launch Android 16 today
articles.summary: Google is releasing Android 16, which includes a built-in battery health metric, Live Activities for individual apps, and a quick-access control feature for Google Wallet. The update also brings improvements to user security with the addition of Advanced Protection measures and cosmetic and usability changes. The Material3 Expressive design, featuring deeper customization and fluid animations, is slated for Android 16 QPR1.

articles.title: I compared Aldi's £3.99 tinted sun cream to £38 version - both gave a healthy glow
articles.author: Ray Bonsall
articles.summary: Aldi launched a tinted face sun cream (£3.99), while Ultra Violette offers SPF 50 future fluid (£38). Aldi's version is cheaper, provides high sun protection, and comes in a 40ml tube, making it suitable for everyday use. Ultra Violette's product has a dewy texture but is more expensive, making it suitable for days with makeup.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 60: Elevating Smartphone Photography and Durability
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: Motorola is launching the Edge 60 smartphone, featuring a 50MP triple-camera system with a Sony LYTIA 700C sensor and a 6.7'' quad-curved pOLED display. The device is powered by a MediaTek Dimensity 7400 chipset and includes AI-driven features through motoAI 2.0. It will be available on June 17, 2025, at an introductory price of Rs. 24,999.

articles.title: EngageLab Unveils Intelligent, End-to-End Email Solution to Empower Brand Growth
articles.author: Engagelab
articles.summary: EngageLab launched its next-generation, end-to-end email solution designed to help brands maximize the impact of every email. The solution leverages AI-driven content, inbox preview, and spam detection to deliver a new standard for email marketing performance and user experience.

articles.title: Motorola Launches edge 60 with 3X50MP AI Cameras, Quad-Curved 1.5K Display & moto ai — Starting at Rs. 24,999*
articles.author: PTI
articles.summary: Motorola has launched the Motorola Edge 60, featuring a 50MP AI camera system, a 6.7" 1.5K pOLED display, and motoAI. The Motorola Edge 60 Fusion is now available in a new Pantone™ Mykonos Blue finish. Both devices will be available on Flipkart, Motorola.in, and leading retail stores across India, with the Edge 60 starting at Rs. 24,999 and the Edge 60 Fusion starting at Rs. 21,999.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 60 With IP69 Rating And 5,500mAh Battery Launched In India: Price, Specs
articles.author: News18
articles.summary: Motorola is launching the Motorola Edge 60, a new variant in their series. The phone focuses on durability and long battery life.

articles.title: Sobot Reveals "AI-First" Strategy for Delivering Human-like Customer Service  Jun. 10, 2025 10:00
articles.summary: Sobot launched its "AI-First" strategy, enhancing its Sobot AI customer contact solution with five pillars: Omnichannel AI, Scenario-Based AI, Multi-Faceted AI, Generative AI, and Secure AI. This move aims to deliver intelligent, human-like customer service, focusing on providing industry-specific solutions and improved efficiency across various customer service roles.

articles.title: WHAT'S GOING ON HERE? All your favourite wellness products and ones on trend in Guelph
articles.author: Joy Struthers
articles.summary: New Age Health + Wellness launched a new store offering a variety of products including nutritional supplements and cleaning products.

articles.title: Motorola Launches edge 60 with 3X50MP AI Cameras, Quad-Curved 1.5K Display & moto ai -- Starting at Rs. 24,999*
articles.author: ANI
articles.summary: Motorola has launched the Motorola Edge 60 smartphone in India, featuring AI-led experiences, a 50MP AI camera system, and a 6.7" 1.5K pOLED display. The phone will be available from June 17th, 2025, starting at INR 24,999. Additionally, Motorola has introduced a new Pantone Mykonos Blue color variant for the Motorola Edge 60 Fusion, available from June 13th, 2025, starting at INR 21,999.

articles.title: Android 16 Stable Release: Out Now!
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Android 16 is a new operating system that introduces features like Desktop Mode, enhanced security, performance optimization, user interface improvements, and AI integrations. The update is rolling out to select devices, with Google Pixel and Samsung Galaxy series being among the first to receive it.

articles.title: Motorola Launches Edge 60 with Segment-First 3x50MP Pro-Grade AI Cameras and Quad-Curved 1.5K Display
articles.author: Vitamins
articles.summary: Motorola has launched the Motorola Edge 60 smartphone, featuring AI-led experiences, a triple 50MP AI camera system with a Sony LYTIA 700C sensor, and a 6.7" 1.5K quad-curved pOLED display. The device, powered by moto AI, also has a durable design and is available in two Pantone colors and will be available for purchase starting June 17th 2025.

articles.title: Samsung says the Galaxy Z Fold 7 is the thinnest and most durable foldable it has ever made
articles.summary: Samsung plans to launch the Galaxy Z Fold 7, touting it as the thinnest, lightest, and most advanced foldable device yet. The new foldable is expected to have a larger display and is meticulously crafted for durability. Speculations also suggest potential models like a Galaxy Z Fold 7 Ultra and other foldables in the Galaxy Z series, including the Galaxy Z Flip 7 and a more affordable Galaxy Z Flip 7 FE.

articles.title: Sorry, this feature isn't currently supported in your country
articles.author: Caitlin Shuda
articles.summary: Tommy's Express Car Wash will open a new location in Plover in early 2026. The car wash will feature a three-minute drive-through tunnel and offer services such as free floor mat washes and vacuum stations.

articles.title: Readers ask: When will Tommy's Express Car Wash open near WoodTrust Bank in Plover?
articles.author: Caitlin Shuda
articles.summary: Tommy's Express Car Wash will open a new location in Plover in early 2026. The car wash, located at 1840 Plover Road, will offer a three-minute drive-through service with exterior vacuums, free floor mat washes, and on-site vacuum stations.

articles.title: EngageLab Unveils Intelligent, End-to-End Email Solution to Empower Brand Growth
articles.author: Engage Lab
articles.summary: EngageLab launched its next-generation, end-to-end email solution, designed to help brands maximize email impact. This solution leverages AI-driven content, inbox preview, and spam detection to improve email marketing performance and user experience.

articles.title: LG Electronics announced on the 10th that it recently held a wedding pledge ceremony "Love to Laundr..
articles.author: Park Seung Ju
articles.summary: LG Electronics is promoting their laundry appliances, including the wash tower, through the "Love to Laundry" campaign. As part of the campaign, LG held a wedding pledge ceremony event in New York, and plans to launch this campaign across the U.S. by July. LG Electronics is also screening new campaign videos and releasing collaborative content to further promote their products.

articles.title: Amazon widens access to video generator as AI ad tools gain traction
articles.author: Peter Adams
articles.summary: Amazon has launched its AI-powered video generator for all U.S. advertisers on its e-commerce platform after a beta period. The video generator creates videos based on a product ID, leveraging customer reviews and other factors.  The tool is free and aims to help marketers create engaging video ads, potentially expanding Amazon's advertising ecosystem.

articles.title: M&S dress 'perfect in every way' back in stock as website relaunches
articles.author: Lea Dzifa Seeberg What's On
articles.summary: M&S has restocked its best-selling "Pure Cotton Printed V-Neck Midi Waisted Dress" online, priced at £45 and available in petite, regular, and tall sizes, after resolving issues due to a cyberattack. The dress is made of 100% cotton with an elasticated waist. Boden's "Sofia Trim Jersey Midi Dress" and New Look's "Yumi Green Bird Floral Print Wrap Style Midi Dress" are introduced as alternatives.

articles.title: Beiersdorf unveils product to boost skin health
articles.author: Punch
articles.summary: Beiersdorf Nigeria launched its NIVEA UV Face Sunscreen at a beachfront event in Lagos. The event included skincare lovers, media personalities, health experts, and influencers.

articles.title: M&S shoppers praise £35 no-iron dress that ‘hides lumps and bumps'
articles.author: Bethan Shufflebotham
articles.summary: Marks and Spencer has reopened online orders, featuring a popular £35 Jersey Textured V-Neck Midi Column Dress praised for its comfortable and flattering design. Additionally, Michelle Keegan's new range at Very and discounted dresses from Roman are highlighted as alternative options for summer events.

articles.title: AliExpress Business Introduces Enhanced Supply Chain Suite to Support Creator Commerce
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: AliExpress Business has launched an upgraded Supply Chain Suite, an integrated toolkit designed to help SMEs, dropshippers, content creators, and group buying organizers bring products to market more quickly and cost-effectively. The enhanced suite includes AI Trend Analyst, AI-Powered Visual Studio, Creator & Buyer Network Integration, and a "One-Shop" Web Interface.

articles.title: Alcatel returns with the launch of V3 series of smartphones in India: Key features, price, availability
articles.summary: Alcatel has launched its V3 series of smartphones in India, featuring the V3 Ultra, V3 Pro, and V3 Classic. A key feature is the NXTPaper Display technology, which reduces eye strain and offers multiple viewing modes. The phones are available on Flipkart with special launch offers.

articles.title: ROG Ally UI Update: Coming to Older Windows Handhelds
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Microsoft is planning to bring the sleek interface of the upcoming ROG Xbox Ally X to older ROG Ally models and other Windows-based handheld consoles, with the update expected to begin rolling out in early 2026. This software update aims to improve the user experience by providing a streamlined interface for accessing games from various storefronts and optimizing performance on Windows handhelds.

articles.title: Virgin Media is giving away FREE Apple gadget worth £439 – but there's only one day left to claim
articles.author: Senior Technology
articles.summary: Virgin Media is offering new customers a free space grey 9th Gen iPad with 64GB storage when they sign onto an 18-month MegaVolt package by June 11. The MegaVolt package costs £88.99 per month and includes telly, broadband, Netflix with ads, Sky Sports HD, Sky Cinema HD, and another subscription service for six months.

articles.title: Sky launches brand new £6 a month TV service TODAY in tempting bid to make Q box owners switch
articles.author: Olivia Stringer
articles.summary: Sky has launched Sky Glass Air, a new TV service starting at £6 per month, targeting entertainment fans and Sky Q users. The new TV comes in three sizes and colors, with optional packages including Sky Essential TV and Sky Ultimate TV. This new model offers a more affordable way to access the Sky experience, aiming to attract users to Sky Glass or Sky Stream.

articles.title: Truist looks to optimize digital onboarding
articles.author: Caitlin Mullen
articles.summary: Truist is enhancing its digital banking experience by introducing features such as mobile identity verification, digital direct deposit connectivity, and AI-powered tools like Truist Client Pulse and Truist Insights. These efforts aim to streamline onboarding, personalize the digital experience, and provide customers with real-time insights to improve financial management.

articles.title: Nigeria's drone ad-tech firm launches aerial billboard innovation
articles.author: Chisom Michael
articles.summary: StareNow, a Nigerian startup, is introducing a new advertising service using drones equipped with LED screens. These 'flying billboards' project brand messages at public gatherings and collect real-time data on crowd reactions via AI, offering a dynamic alternative to traditional advertising. StareNow plans to expand its services beyond Nigeria and is seeking partners and investors.

articles.title: Lobo Digital Launches in London, Offering Free Marketing Services to UK & Ireland Businesses
articles.author: Pressat
articles.summary: Lobo Digital, a new branding, web design, and digital marketing agency, launched with the aim of transforming the digital landscape for businesses across the UK and Ireland. The company intends to be an extension of its clients' teams, focusing on client success.

articles.title: Samsung Unveils Thinnest and Lightest Galaxy Z Series Foldables Yet
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics has launched its latest Galaxy Z series, which are the thinnest, lightest, and most durable foldables produced by the company. The new Galaxy Z models feature enhancements in multitasking capabilities, immersive content experiences, and improved portability. These devices are designed to offer both versatility and elegance to users.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 60 5G launched in India! Triple 50MP cameras, Dimensity 7400, all at ₹24,999
articles.author: Tech Desk
articles.summary: Motorola launched the Motorola Edge 60 smartphone in India, featuring a 50MP triple camera system, a 6.7-inch quad-curved 1.5K display, and a 5500mAh battery with 68W TurboPower charging. The phone is priced at ₹24,999 for the 12+256GB variant and will be available on Flipkart starting June 17.

articles.title: Not just a Kickstarter knockoff, Wadiz CEO sets out global vision
articles.author: CHO YONG-JUN
articles.summary: Wadiz, a Korean crowdfunding platform, launched its global service with AI-powered translation and a focus on Korean products. The launch involves a phased approach, beginning with Korean sellers and eventually expanding to non-Korean sellers with localized platforms. They are also focusing on "Wadiz Edition" where they work with the creator to improve upon their campaigns.

articles.title: Samsung teases super slim Galaxy Z Fold Ultra series phone
articles.author: Rohit KVN
articles.summary: Samsung is releasing the Galaxy Z Fold7 Ultra. The product is likely a new generation of foldable smartphone.

articles.title: Crayon expands Google Cloud partnership to include mid-market distribution, focused on AI innovation
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Crayon expands its strategic partnership with Google Cloud to deliver AI technologies and cloud solutions to businesses worldwide, including the mid-market segment. As a Google Cloud Distributor, Crayon will provide streamlined access to Google Cloud's portfolio, specialized support, and simplified billing, accelerating the adoption of Google Cloud's AI capabilities.

articles.title: Windows 11 tests Android screen mirroring from the Start menu
articles.author: Viktor Eriksson
articles.summary: Microsoft introduced a new feature in Windows 11, enabling users to mirror their Android phone screen directly from the Start menu. Users can now initiate screen sharing by clicking their device's icon in the Start menu's phone companion panel.

articles.title: Free up time with Beatbot AquaSense 2 Ultra, the first robot pool cleaner with hybrid-AI mapping
articles.author: Beatbot
articles.summary: A genius pool cleaning appliance is available with a 62% discount. This product aims to reduce pool cleaning time, allowing for more time spent enjoying the pool.

articles.title: Landers Superstore goes all out with biggest Super Crazy Sale for its 9th year
articles.summary: Landers Superstore is celebrating its 9th anniversary with the launch of the Super Crazy Sale featuring 50% off deals and a Piso Sale. Additionally, Landers Central and Doppio are offering special menu items and discounts. Landers also introduced the Landers Millionaire Promo, awarding shopping sprees to lucky members.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 60 Launch Today in India; Check Expected Price, Specifications and Features
articles.author: Team Latestly
articles.summary: Motorola is launching the Edge 60 smartphone in India on June 10th. The Edge 60 features a 6.7-inch display, MediaTek Dimensity 7400 chipset, 12GB RAM, 256GB storage, a 50MP Sony rear camera, and a 50MP front camera. It will be available in PANTONE Gibraltar Sea and PANTONE Shamrock colors and is expected to be priced between INR 20,000 and INR 25,000, launching on Flipkart and in stores.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy A56 5G vs S24 FE: June 2025 Prices
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch several new Galaxy smartphones. The Galaxy S25 is expected to feature the Snapdragon 8 Elite processor and a 50MP camera, while the Galaxy A56 5G is anticipated as a mid-range phone with a vibrant AMOLED display and improved battery life. The S24 FE aims to offer premium features at a more accessible price point, with an improved camera and processor comparable to the S24.

articles.title: Excited for iOS 26? What You Should Know Before Installing the Developer Version
articles.author: Blake Stimac
articles.summary: Apple unveiled iOS 26 at its Worldwide Developer Conference, featuring a new 'Liquid Glass' design language. A developer beta of iOS 26 will soon be available, offering a user interface inspired by the VisionOS software for the Vision Pro headset. Apple bypassed iOS 19, jumping directly from iOS 18 to iOS 26.

articles.title: Samsung Says Its Next Galaxy Z Foldables Will Be Its 'Thinnest, Lightest'
articles.author: Abrar Al-Heeti
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch its newest Galaxy Z series foldable phones, emphasizing their slim and lightweight design. The devices promise to be the 'thinnest, lightest and most advanced foldable yet.' The company is also teasing a 'powerful camera' and 'AI-powered tools' for the new foldables.

articles.title: The first Xbox handheld: Microsoft and Asus unveil ROG Xbox Ally with Windows 11 and multi-store gaming
articles.author: Rob Thubron
articles.summary: Microsoft and Asus have launched two new handheld gaming devices: the ROG Xbox Ally and ROG Xbox Ally X. These Windows 11-powered devices will allow users to play games from various storefronts like Steam, Epic, Game Pass, and Xbox. The devices feature a 7-inch 1080p IPS screen with a 120Hz refresh rate and VRR support.

articles.title: AMD unveils Ryzen AI Z2 Extreme and Z2 A chips powering Xbox gaming handhelds
articles.author: Kishalaya Kundu
articles.summary: AMD has expanded its Ryzen Z2 family by launching the Ryzen AI Z2 Extreme and Ryzen Z2 A APUs. These chips power newly launched Xbox-branded gaming handhelds such as the ROG Xbox Ally and ROG Xbox Ally X. The Ryzen Z2 Extreme includes an NPU offering 50 TOPS of AI compute power, an 8-core, 16-thread CPU, 16 RDNA 3.5 graphics compute units, and supports LPDDR5X-8000 memory.

articles.title: GOG adds official mod support, offering one-click installs for select games
articles.author: Alfonso Maruccia
articles.summary: GOG, owned by CD Projekt Red, is expanding its services with a new feature: "one-click" game mods. This addition provides free, easily accessible content for games sold through the GOG store, aiming to simplify the modding process for users and positioning GOG as a competitor to Steam Workshop.

articles.title: Microsoft enters portable gaming with new ROG Xbox Ally devices
articles.author: Krysta Escobar
articles.summary: Microsoft's Xbox, in collaboration with ASUS, is launching its first handheld device. This device offers a full-screen Xbox gaming experience intended for portable use, providing access to Xbox games and streaming content.

articles.title: Virgin Media's free iPad giveaway ends in hours
articles.author: Harriet Morphy-Morris
articles.summary: Virgin Media is offering a free iPad Cellular 64GB (9th Gen) to customers who purchase their 18-month Mega Volt bundle, which includes access to over 230 TV channels, 1,130Mbps fibre broadband, and a Netflix subscription. This deal, which ends on June 11th, provides access to Sky Sports and Sky Cinema, plus an O2 SIM card with unlimited data, all for £88.99 per month.

articles.title: Adobe Expands AI agentic offerings, adds new agent capabilities in Adobe experience platform
articles.author: Adgully Bureau
articles.summary: Adobe has launched two new AI agents: Product Support Agent and Data Insights Agent. Product Support Agent assists marketing and customer experience teams by providing interactive troubleshooting and case management within Adobe Experience Platform applications. Data Insights Agent, built on Adobe Experience Platform Agent Orchestrator, supports orchestrating AI agents for customer engagement across Adobe applications and third-party ecosystems.

articles.title: Galaxy Z Fold 7 Archives
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Samsung is developing the Galaxy Z Fold 7, potentially aiming for a smaller, more compact design. The 'Ultra' naming convention for the device is currently unconfirmed.

articles.title: Galaxy Z Flip 7 Archives
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Samsung is developing a new mobile design for the Galaxy Z Fold 7, potentially redefining mobile form factors with a focus on a smaller size. The device signals a new era of mobile design.

articles.title: Sobot Reveals "AI-First" Strategy for Delivering Human-like Customer Service
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Sobot unveiled its "AI-First" strategy, introducing Sobot AI with five pillars: Omnichannel AI, Scenario-Based AI, Multi-Faceted AI, Generative AI and Secure AI. Designed for experience-led and efficient customer service, the new Sobot AI includes features like AI voicebot, industry-specific solutions, and support for customers, agents, and administrators.

articles.title: Woolworths announces major change to its famous mud cakes: 'I need it in my life'
articles.author: SHANIA OBRIEN
articles.summary: Woolworths launched a new "Choc Chip Cookie Mud Cake" priced at $7. The limited-edition 600g dessert features a caramel mud cake base with cookie pieces and a choc chip drizzle. Early reviews have been positive, with some calling it one of Woolworths' best mud cakes ever.

articles.title: 35 Beauty Items So Magical, They Could Have Pixie Dust
articles.author: Gabriela Manjarrez
articles.summary: E.l.f. introduced the Suntouchable Invisible Sunscreen SPF 35 as a clear gel formula. L'Oreal launched Lumi Glotion, an illuminating lotion with hydrating factors. Coco & Eve released Sunless Face Tanning Micromist that boosts collagen production.

articles.title: 2025 Tata Altroz walkaround, Price, Features, Engine Options and More
articles.summary: Tata Altroz is launching a facelift version of its Altroz car. The updated version includes changes in features and pricing. A video provides a walkaround of the new Tata Altroz facelift and covers all the new features.

articles.title: These 38 Products Will Help Summer-Haters Survive It
articles.author: Taylor Steele
articles.summary: Arm & Hammer introduces deodorizers perfect for tossing into sneakers. Burt's Bees launches after sun lotion containing coconut, aloe, and antioxidants. First Aid Beauty releases a vegan and cruelty-free bump eraser scrub made with 10% AHA. Sun Bum offers a vegan and reef-friendly SPF 50 sunscreen spray. Yonanas introduces a soft serve maker. E.l.f. launches a lightweight putty primer infused with squalane.

articles.title: [의학칼럼] 수술 시기 놓치면 걸을 수 없어… '노인성 척추질환' 치료 골든타임은?
articles.author: Health Chosun
articles.summary: Toyota is promoting the "All New RAV 4", suggesting an updated or redesigned version of the vehicle is available. The advertisement highlights the vehicle's stunning design and affordable price.

articles.title: '고3 이후 최고 몸무게' 남보라, 다이어트 선언… 어떻게 빼나 봤더니?
articles.author: Health Chosun
articles.summary: Apartments.com provides a service that helps users find apartments.

articles.title: Kia begins mass production of next-gen military medium tactical vehicle
articles.author: Yonhap News
articles.summary: Kia Corp. held a roll-out ceremony.

articles.title: The general store returns to downtown New Ulm with an artisanal twist
articles.author: Clay Schuldt
articles.summary: Mabel's Merkantil, a new marketplace for craft vendors, held its grand opening, offering handcrafted items from over 35 local Minnesota crafters. The grand opening also featured a pop-up shop by The Crust & Crumbs Cottage, a sourdough micro-bakery, which introduced its bread, brioche, and bagels to customers.

articles.title: How To Build Your Dream Life With AI
articles.author: Jodie Cook
articles.summary: Ngozi Elobuike, a global AI strategist and entrepreneur, has launched two premium beverage products and written an AI-powered travel book. These ventures demonstrate the application of AI in building and scaling new products.

articles.title: How AI Agents Are Eliminating Boring Work In 2025
articles.author: Aytekin Tank
articles.summary: HyperWrite's browser-based AI assistant reads, prioritizes, and responds to emails on the user's behalf. Credit card companies like Visa and Mastercard are rolling out autonomous agents to shop and make purchases. Google's Gemini 2.0 offers personalized search assistance through AI-powered dialogue. Microsoft is launching AI agents for research and analysis, and Notion AI can search across connected tools.

articles.title: [아미랑] 추억을 꺼내어 마주하는 시간, 내가 치유되는 시간
articles.author: Health Chosun
articles.summary: Toyota is launching "All New RAV 4". The product is being advertised as stunning and cheap.

articles.title: ‘로봇 하품'도 전염될까?
articles.author: Health Chosun
articles.summary: Toyota has introduced an all-new RAV 4 model. The vehicle is being promoted as both "stunning" and "cheap," indicating an emphasis on both aesthetic appeal and affordability.

articles.title: IndNewsWire Launches Press Release Writing & Distribution Service to Boost Online Visibility for Businesses
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: A company is introducing a new offering designed for small businesses and startups. The offering is intended to help these businesses grow their brand, gain visibility, and compete effectively without incurring high public relations expenses.

articles.title: Get Your Hands on the Roborock Qrevo Master Robot Vacuum and Mop With $800 Off ...
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: A top-rated robot vacuum and mop is currently being offered at a 50% discount.

articles.title: I reviewed the new Timekettle T1 AI translator and it's great for global travel
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: The T1 AI translator is a new pocket-sized handset. Initial testing reveals the translator to be versatile.

articles.title: Emaar Properties Launches VYOM
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: Emaar Properties has launched VYOM, a new digital resale platform. This platform is intended to change how resales are conducted.
